about_the_game:
Puzzle Plunder Pirate seas is 100% free to play and enjoy. If you enjoy the game consider purchasing this DLC package to support my work, my games and Puzzle Plunder. You will also get an awesome gold pirate ship to sail in!

Whats this DLC for?

  • Show your support!
  • Get an awesome gold pirate ship
  • Get a warm toasty feeling in your heart for supporting the game and me, the developer!

This DLC was released prior to the Vampire Night expansion. Purchasing this DLC will also grant you a golden horse and cart!
